document_data.mainbody:
Lightnings Lure Liqueur was a variety of magical spirits named after the lightning lure spell, available in the city of Waterdeep in the late 15 century DR.
The enchanted beverage was on Yawning Portal taverns menu in Waterdeep with its bottle stashed away in Durnans cabinet. One serving of Lightnings Lure Liqueur was priced at ten gold coins.
